title: I popped a pimple, thought blood came out, but it was fleshy and still attached to me. It burns when I touch it. Is it possible that a pimples can invert? - Quora

response.answer_text: It could also be a type of cyst, if you didn't get all of that material out this pimple will keep reappearing so I recommend doing some research on how to handle this or seeing a dermatologist.

Yes, the pressure you put on it can cause the sebum to rupture out the side of the pore, when there’s a hard cap on the top (whitehead or blackhead). Applying suction to it instead of squeezing is safer.
